trans-unit.source: Specifies the appearance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>
trans-unit.target: 指定的外觀<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A> property to specify settings such as color, width, transparency, and the shape of the stylus tip for a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A>屬性來指定設定，例如色彩、 寬度、 透明度、 和<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>的手寫筆提示圖形</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A> property to specify the drawing attributes for the strokes added to an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A>屬性來指定加入至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>筆劃的繪圖屬性</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A>

trans-unit.source: Only strokes that are added after the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A> undergo change show the updated attributes.
trans-unit.target: 只有筆劃後加入<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A>接受變更顯示更新的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the strokes that are already on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> does not change.
trans-unit.target: 已開啟的筆劃外觀<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>不會變更。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the DrawingAttributes class, see the DrawingAttributes constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需 DrawingAttributes 類別的執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱 DrawingAttributes 建構函式。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage This class is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文字用法，XAML 中通常不使用這個類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A>|Black| |<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>|2 device independent pixels (DIP)| |<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.StylusTip?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.Identity%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>|2 DIP|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |初始值 | |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A>|黑色 | |<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>|&2; 裝置無關的像素 (DIP) | |<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.StylusTip?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.Identity%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>|2 DIP|</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.Identity%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A></xref:System.Windows.Ink.StylusTip?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A></xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A></xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A></xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A></xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A></xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adds a custom property to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 新增自訂屬性來<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.target: AddPropertyData 方法可讓您新增自訂屬性至<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you render your own strokes and want to provide extra information.
trans-unit.target: 您轉譯您自己的筆劃與想要提供額外的資訊時，這非常有用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> to associate with the custom property.

trans-unit.source: The value of the custom property.
trans-unit.target: 自訂屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: `propertyData` must be of type <xref:System.Char>, <xref:System.Byte>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt64>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.Boolean>, <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal> or an array of these data types; however it cannot be an array of type <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: `propertyData`必須是型別<xref:System.Char>， <xref:System.Byte>， <xref:System.Int16>， <xref:System.UInt16>， <xref:System.Int32>， <xref:System.UInt32>， <xref:System.Int64>， <xref:System.UInt64>， <xref:System.Single>， <xref:System.Double>， <xref:System.DateTime>， <xref:System.Boolean>， <xref:System.String>，<xref:System.Decimal>或這些資料的陣列型別，但是不能型別的陣列<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Decimal> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Boolean> </xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Single> </xref:System.UInt64> </xref:System.Int64> </xref:System.UInt32> </xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.UInt16> </xref:System.Int16> </xref:System.Byte> </xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.target: propertyDatais .

trans-unit.target: propertyDataId為空。

trans-unit.target: -propertyData不是其中一個允許的資料類型中所列 > 一節。

trans-unit.source: Any custom properties are also copied.
trans-unit.target: 也會複製任何自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 一份<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否指定<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref>物件是否等於目前<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects are equal if the following properties are equal: - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A> > [!NOTE] > The Equals method does not check the custom properties for equality.
trans-unit.target: 兩個<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>物件是否相等的下列屬性是否相等:- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A>> [!NOTE] > Equals 方法不會檢查是否相等的自訂屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of the stylus used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來繪製手寫筆的高度<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The following factors affect the height and width of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> when it is rendered, but not the value of the Height property.
trans-unit.target: 下列因素影響的高度和寬度<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>呈現時，但不是高度屬性值。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: - The amount of pressure applied to the stylus when the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is drawn.
trans-unit.target: -量套用到手寫筆的壓力時<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>繪製。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: - The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -值<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the Height property to 0 device independent pixels (DIP), it is changed to 2 DIP.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的 Height 屬性設定為 0 裝置無關的像素 (DIP) 時，它會變更為 2 的 DIP。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文字使用這個屬性通常不是在 XAML 中使用。

trans-unit.source: The value that indicates the height of the stylus used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值，指出手寫筆用來繪製的高度<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Height property is less than <xref:System.Double.Epsilon?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 高度屬性小於<xref:System.Double.Epsilon?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the thickness of a rendered <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> changes according the amount of pressure applied.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否轉譯的粗細<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>根據套用的壓力大小的變更。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文字使用這個屬性通常不是在 XAML 中使用。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the thickness of the stroke is uniform; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that the thickness of a rendered <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> increases when pressure is increased.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示的筆劃粗細統一;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示呈現的粗細<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>不足的壓力會增加而增加。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> looks like a highlighter.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>看起來像螢光筆。

trans-unit.source: When the IsHighlighter property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is slightly transparent, which allows the strokes underneath to appear.
trans-unit.target: 當 IsHighlighter 屬性設定為`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>是稍微透明的可讓筆劃下方出現。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>要呈現<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>為螢光筆; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the smallest value allowed for the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height*> property.
trans-unit.target: 指定允許的最小值<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height*>

trans-unit.source: Use the MinHeight field to check whether a value is within the limits allowed for the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要檢查值是否在允許的限制範圍內使用 MinHeight 欄位<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: Do this when the value comes from an unknown source, such as unconstrained user input.
trans-unit.target: 這個值來自不明來源，例如未受限制的使用者輸入時執行此動作。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the smallest value allowed for the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width*> property.
trans-unit.target: 指定允許的最小值<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width*>

trans-unit.source: Use the MinWidth field to check whether a value is within the limits allowed for the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要檢查值是否在允許的限制範圍內使用 MinWidth 欄位<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: Do this when the value comes from an unknown source, such as unconstrained user input.
trans-unit.target: 這個值來自不明來源，例如未受限制的使用者輸入時執行此動作。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.AttributeChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.AttributeChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: The OnAttributeChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnAttributeChanged 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: e is .
trans-unit.target: eis .

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於任何<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref>屬性變更。

trans-unit.source: EventArgs
trans-unit.target: EventArgs

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.PropertyDataChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.PropertyDataChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: The OnPropertyDataChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnPropertyDataChanged 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: e is .
trans-unit.target: eis .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> objects are equal.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否指定<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref>物件是否相等。

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects are equal if the following properties are equal: - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> > [!NOTE] > The Equality method does not check the custom properties for equality.
trans-unit.target: 兩個<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>物件是否相等的下列屬性是否相等:- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>> [!NOTE] > 相等方法不會檢查是否相等的自訂屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 第一個<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref>来比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 第二個<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref>来比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the objects are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果物件相等。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> objects are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否指定<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref>物件不相等。

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects are not equal if the following properties are not equal: - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> > [!NOTE] > The Inequality method does not check the custom properties for equality.
trans-unit.target: 兩個<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>物件不相等，如果不相等的下列屬性:- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>> [!NOTE] > 的不等比較方法不會檢查是否相等的自訂屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 第一個<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref>来比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 第二個<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref>来比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the objects are not equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果物件不相等。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when property data is added or removed from the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 新增或移除屬性資料時，就會發生<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Removes the custom property associated with the specified <xref:System.Guid>.
trans-unit.target: 移除與指定<xref:System.Guid>.</xref:System.Guid>相關聯的自訂屬性

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> associated with the custom property to remove.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Guid>與要移除之自訂屬性相關聯。</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: propertyDataId is not associated with a custom property of the object.
trans-unit.target: propertyDataId不是相關聯的自訂屬性物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shape of the stylus used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來繪製手寫筆的形狀<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文字使用這個屬性通常不是在 XAML 中使用。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref> that specifies the transformation to perform on the stylus' tip.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref>指定手寫筆的提示上執行轉換。

trans-unit.source: Use the StylusTipTransform property to rotate, skew, or scale the stylus tip.
trans-unit.target: StylusTipTransform 屬性用於旋轉、 扭曲或調整手寫筆提示。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文字使用這個屬性通常不是在 XAML 中使用。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref> that specifies the transformation to perform on the stylus' tip.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"> </xref>指定手寫筆的提示上執行轉換。

trans-unit.source: The matrix set to StylusTipTransform is not an invertible matrix.
trans-unit.target: 設定為 StylusTipTransform matrix 不是可反轉的矩陣。

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetX*> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetY*> property of the matrix is not zero.
trans-unit.target: -或- <> </> *> 或<> *> 矩陣的屬性不是零。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the stylus used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來繪製手寫筆的寬度<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The following factors affect the height and width of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> when it is rendered, but not the value of the Width property.
trans-unit.target: 下列因素影響的高度和寬度<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>呈現時，但不是 [寬度] 屬性的值。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: - The amount of pressure applied to the stylus when the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is drawn.
trans-unit.target: -量套用到手寫筆的壓力時<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>繪製。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: - The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -值<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the Width property to 0 device independent pixels (DIP), it is changed to 2 DIP.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的 Width 屬性設定為 0 裝置無關的像素 (DIP) 時，它會變更為 2 的 DIP。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文字使用這個屬性通常不是在 XAML 中使用。

trans-unit.source: The width of the stylus used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 用來繪製手寫筆的寬度<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Width property is less than <xref:System.Double.Epsilon?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 寬度屬性是小於<xref:System.Double.Epsilon?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>。
